publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1817# Mr Jamie Stone: Sustaining Agriculture and Sustaining Communities—That the Parliament believes that sustaining a viable agricultural sector involves encouraging an increase in employment on Scotland’s land and that this would strengthen the contribution of agriculture to the viability of rural communities and contribute to the nutritional health of Scotland.
S2M-1817# Sustaining Agriculture and Sustaining Communities (lodged on 1 October 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
